text: Emilio Estevez (born May 12, 1962) is an actor, director and producer. He was originally part of the Brat Pack in the 1980s. His most notable movies include The Breakfast Club, Repo Man and Men at Work. Estevez' father is actor Martin Sheen. His brother is actor Charlie Sheen. == References == ==Other websites== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Emilio Estevez
